entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
